input.sentences: grandpa was excited that everyone came by .
he was especially happy to see his grandchild .
he was older now but he still had a great sense of humor .
everyone was happy that they surprised him .

output.sentences: Grandpa was so excited to have all his family around him for his very special day.
Seeing his youngest grandchild was a big treat and made him very happy.
Grandpa looks so serious, but he actually has a great sense of humor.
He was so surprised and happy when his children from America came to his birthday party.
Grandpa has such a nice and loving family and it was great to see them all together at one time, for once.
